text: Imran Riaz Khan, born 14 August 1975, is a former Pakistani anchor, journalist and YouTuber. == Career == Riaz began working for a local newspaper as a criminal reporter. Riaz has also worked with the television networks Samaa TV and GNN as a current affairs host. He later joined the Express News channel as a news anchor. == Early life and Education == Riaz attended the Lahore Grammar School for his early education before attending Punjab University to study mass communication. == References == Category:Living people Category:Journalists Category:News media
title: Imran Riaz Khan
